articles.content: China-based electronics brand Huawei has launched Freebuds 3 True Wireless Stereo Earbuds in India. The company claims that Freebuds 3 is only open-fit true wireless earphones with active noise cancellation and it is priced at Rs 12,990.The earbuds will go on… [+2034 chars]
